product_name: Kelty TraiLogic SB 31 Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: The women's Kelty TraiLogic SB 31 Sleeping Bag features 800-fill DriDown(TM) insulation that defends against moisture and keeps you wrapped in warmth no matter how quickly the temperature drops. With a European Norm (EN) comfort rating of 31degF, the SB 31 is suitable for 3-season backpacking when temperatures dip just below freezing. High-quality 800-fill-power DriDown(TM) down insulation fends off moisture to help maintain warmth. Waterproof fabric at the head and feet is positioned to keep you from feeling the effects of condensation on tent walls. A draft tube backs the 60-in. 2-way zipper to keep cold air out; antisnag design keeps the zipper from catching on the fabric. Kelty TraiLogic SB 31 Sleeping Bag comes with a storage bag and stuff sack. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
short_description: The women's Kelty TraiLogic SB 31 Sleeping Bag features 800-fill DriDown(TM) insulation that defends against moisture and keeps you wrapped in warmth no matter how quickly the temperature drops.
